name: react-jogwheel
description: Take control of your CSS keyframe animations with React

scripts.prebuild: parallelshell 'npm run test' 'npm run clean && npm run prepare'
scripts.build: (babel source --out-dir distribution && cat source/index.js | react2dts --name $npm_package_name > distribution/index.d.ts) && echo '' || notify -t 'react-jogwgeel' -m 'Build failed! ðŸ˜¢'
scripts.postbuild: npm run copy && npm run notify
scripts.test: eslint source/**/*.js && echo '' || notify -t 'react-jogwgeel' -m 'Linting failed! ðŸ˜¢'
scripts.notify: echo 'Build ready, happy hacking! âœŠ' && notify -t 'react-jogwgeel' -m 'Build ready, happy hacking! âœŠ'

author: Mario Nebl <hello@herebecode.com>
